title: Phantasmal Metamorphosis
specification: Pressed CD / KoDyMaxx 1st Touhou Best Album
release_date: Aug 17, 2025 (Comic Market 106 Day 2) [コミックマーケット106 2日目]
booth: Four Corners / 東ホール6 オ-24b
price: Pre-Order & Event Price: 10€ / 1500 yen | Post Release Price: 13€ / 2000 yen

01.title: City Protector Reimu
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Maxx (KodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Maiden's Capriccio ~ Dream Battle [少女綺想曲　～ Dream Battle]
• Source: Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night. [東方永夜抄　～ Imperishable Night.]

02.title: Bad Apple!! Gensokyo Night Fever (2025 Remaster)
description: • Programmed, Produced by Maxx (kodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds) & Dylan Hendrick
• Mastered by malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Source: Touhou Gensokyo ~ Lotus Land Story. [東方幻想郷　～ Lotus Land Story.]

• About this track: Party in Gensokyo like it's 1975! Forget all of your worries, get ready to dance and have a good time. DJ Reimu is here to rock the house in this disco arrangement of this classic track, and you're invited!
Re-Arrange of "Bad Apple!!" from "Lovelight" by Alstroemeria Records

03.title: Floydian Frost - Beloved Tomboyish Dreamer
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Tomboyish Girl in Love [おてんば恋娘]
• Source: Touhou Koumakyou ~ the Embodiment of Scarlet Devil. [東方紅魔郷　～ the Embodiment of Scarlet Devil.]

• About this track: This song is our hommage to the classic rock era, in the style of a certain legendary prog-rock figure/band. A perfect track to listen to while doing your taxes, and perfectly fitting for our beloved smart ice fairy.

04.title: Dark Fragrance of Your Soul
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Dark Side of Fate [運命のダークサイド]
• Source: Touhou Fuujinroku ~ Mountain of Faith. [東方風神録　～ Mountain of Faith.]
• Used Software: FL Studio 20, Reaper, Cubase
• Used VSTs & Samples: Nexus 2, Addictive drums 2
Originally from "Gensokyo Party Vol. 3 Moriya Barista" by KodamaSounds

05.title: Autumnal Reverie: Inada's Rebuke
description: • Original Track: Spiritual Domination ~ Who done it! [妖々跋扈　～ Who done it!]
• Source: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Perfect Cherry Blossom. [東方妖々夢　～ Perfect Cherry Blossom.]

06.title: Heiliger Gebetsbereich (2025 Remaster)
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Maxx (KodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Source: Touhou Rei'iden ~ Highly Responsive to Prayers. [東方靈異伝　～ Highly Responsive to Prayers.]
• Used Software: Reaper, Cubase, FL Studio
• Used VSTs & Samples: Neural DSP Archetype Gojira, GetGood Drums One Kit Wonder Metal
• About this track: This track was inspired by the German Metal and Industrial scene, with a marching beat capturing the feeling of a brand new adventure, where it all began.
Originally from "Gensokyo Party Vol. 5 VANTABLACK 2" by KodamaSounds

07.title: Bloodline Madness
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Maxx (KodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: U.N. Owen Was Her? [U.N.オーエンは彼女なのか？]
• Source: Touhou Koumakyou ~ the Embodiment of Scarlet Devil. [東方紅魔郷　～ the Embodiment of Scarlet Devil.]

08.title: LAMENT of GAZANIA (2025 Remaster)
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Kopan (KodamaSounds), Maxx (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Necrofantasia [ネクロファンタジア]
• Source: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Perfect Cherry Blossom. [東方妖々夢　～ Perfect Cherry Blossom.]
• Used VSTs & Samples: Triton Extreme / refx Nexus
• About this track: LAMENT of GAZANIA is a story of reconcilliation in the darkest hour.
Won’t you meet me at dawn? Come alone, ‘fore the sun,
Bring with you all that you are,
And I’ll give you all I am,
With a passionate kiss, wear my name on your lips,
Show me that you really do understand
Won’t you hold for me one, final breath? As we’re swept up in this fantasy, won’t you please let me be more selfish?
The feeling ignites, burning fast, burning bright, leaving nothing but ashes in sight
First we start the trance, two doomed lovers dance endlessly
Darkness clouds the sky, still moving in time,
Out of breath but there’s no reprieve
Reaching forward, heading towards an impending grief
With heavy burdens can’t be relieved
Underneath a blackened sky, a tale is woven fatefully to end in our demise,
Fated to destroy each other until not a soul is left alive
Reminiscing all about the pieces of a perfect fantasy we should have made
Still my memory fades, leaving but a voice behind to tell me that it’s meant to be this way
Still I cannot bring myself to betray what’s in my heart
Always set to stay worlds apart,
Even so, I will never stop following your ghost through the dark.
Underneath a blackened sky, a tale is woven fatefully to end in our demise,
Fated to destroy each other until not a soul is left alive
Reminiscing all about the pieces of a perfect fantasy we should have made
Still my memory fades, leaving but a voice behind to tell me that it’s meant to be this way
Tell me that you love me, that you need me, don’t deceive me, as the night comes to an end,
Lit by the horizon’s glow, a silent vow is made between two friends
You let go of my hand,
Whispering of journeys past, a memory, though it’s fading as the seconds finally pass
your fingers slip from mine but with a smile because our tale is told at last.
Originally from "Gensokyo Party Vol. 5 VANTABLACK 2" by KodamaSounds

09.title: Darkened Magician's Meltdown
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Love-Colored Master Spark [恋色マスタースパーク]
• Source: Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night. [東方永夜抄　～ Imperishable Night.]

• About this track: Heavily inspired by the Deathcore scene with a touch of progressive style, this arrangement shows a darker, corrupted, unhinged and more malancholic side to Marisa. Slower, heavier with an explosive impact.

10.title: Temporal Carnage: A Maid's Reckoning
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Flowering Night [フラワリングナイト]
• Source: Touhou Kaeidzuka ~ Phantasmagoria of Flower View. [東方花映塚　～ Phantasmagoria of Flower View.]

• About this track: Fear the wrath of the maid of doom, Sakuya. She's here to rip and tear until it is done (then clean up the mess later, of course). Forget spellcard rules, it's time for pure sonic violence!

11.title: CATATATA
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Maxx (KodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: The Fantastic Tales from Tono [遠野幻想物語] / Flowering Night [フラワリングナイト]
• Source: Touhou Youyoumu ~ Perfect Cherry Blossom. [東方妖々夢　～ Perfect Cherry Blossom.] / Touhou Kaeidzuka ~ Phantasmagoria of Flower View [東方花映塚　～ Phantasmagoria of Flower View.]

• About this track: An electrified voyage through breakneck rhythms. This track reimagines the brilliance and mystery of a lunar genius through the lens of high-intensity drum & bass. Synths pulse like neural signals,  basslines surge with urgency, drift through the chaos like data streaming from a celestial mainframe. Inspired by the fusion of electronic and live playing energy, this arrangement channels the analytical precision and boundless intellect of the Hourai pharmacist into a sound form both volatile and visionary.

12.title: Out of Mind
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Illusionary Night ~ Ghostly Eyes [幻視の夜　～ Ghostly Eyes]
• Source: Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night. [東方永夜抄　～ Imperishable Night]
Originally from "Gensokyo Party Vol. 2 VANTABLACK" by KodamaSounds

13.title: Lunar Velocity
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Maxx (KodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Gensokyo Millennium ~ History of the Moon [千年幻想郷　～ History of the Moon]
• Source: Touhou Eiyashou ~ Imperishable Night. [東方永夜抄　～ Imperishable Night.]

14.title: Eternal Faith - Something About You
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Native Faith [ネイティブフェイス]
• Source: Touhou Fuujinroku ~ Mountain of Faith. [東方風神録　～ Mountain of Faith.]

• About this track: A gentle descent into warmth and groove, this arrangement paints the goddess of earth and ancient ponds in shades of vintage synths, tender basslines, and melancholic melodies. It’s a love letter whispered through vocoder haze and smooth rhythms, where myth and emotion intertwine. Channeling the sacred and the sentimental, the track explores the softer, more human side of a deity long buried beneath moss and memory—where every note feels like a forgotten touch from an older, simpler world.
There's something ancient in the night,
A faith that whispers through the pines.
In the shadows of the shrine,
A goddess who can turn the tides.
With a touch of the past,
In the heart of the shrine,
A faith that's old and wise,

15.title: Whispers of the Wind
description: • Guitars, Bass, Sound Design & Additional Synth: Maxx (KodamaSounds)
• Programmed & Produced by Maxx (KodamaSounds), Kopan (KodamaSounds), Dylan Hendrick
• Mastering Engineer: malicent (Cursed Monastery / Sigillum Azoetia)
• Original Track: Faith is for the Transient People [信仰は儚き人間の為に]
• Source: Touhou Fuujinroku ~ Mountain of Faith. [東方風神録　～ Mountain of Faith.]
